verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> and to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> and Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אָדָ֗ם <WH120> When a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> has בְעוֹר־ <WH5785> shall have in the skin בְּשָׂרוֹ֙ <WH1320> of his flesh שְׂאֵ֤ת <WH7613> a rising אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or סַפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH5597> a scab א֣וֹ <WH176> or בַהֶ֔רֶת <WH934> or bright spot וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> becomes בְעוֹר־ <WH5785> and it be in the skin בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <WH1320> of his flesh לְנֶ֣גַע <WH5061> [like] the plague צָרָ֑עַת <WH6883> of leprosy וְהוּבָא֙ <WH935> then he shall be brought אֶל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> unto Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest א֛וֹ <WH176> or אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחַ֥ד <WH259> or unto one מִבָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> of his sons הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <WH3548> the priests

וְרָאָ֣ה <WH7200> shall look הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֶּ֣גַע <WH5061> on the plague בְּעֽוֹר־ <WH5785> in the skin הַ֠בָּשָׂר <WH1320> of the flesh וְשֵׂעָ֨ר <WH8181> and [when] the hair בַּנֶּ֜גַע <WH5061> in the plague הָפַ֣ךְ ׀ <WH2015> is turned לָבָ֗ן <WH3836> white וּמַרְאֵ֤ה <WH4758> in sight הַנֶּ֙גַע֙ <WH5061> and the plague עָמֹק֙ <WH6013> [be] deeper מֵע֣וֹר <WH5785> than the skin בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <WH1320> of his flesh נֶ֥גַע <WH5061> it [is] a plague צָרַ֖עַת <WH6883> of leprosy ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְרָאָ֥הוּ <WH7200> shall look הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> and the priest וְטִמֵּ֥א <WH2930> on him and pronounce him unclean אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְאִם־ <WH518> if בַּהֶרֶת֩ <WH934> If the bright spot לְבָנָ֨ה <WH3836> [be] white הִ֜וא <WH1931> he בְּע֣וֹר <WH5785> in the skin בְּשָׂר֗וֹ <WH1320> of his flesh וְעָמֹק֙ <WH6013> [be] not deeper אֵין־ <WH369> does not מַרְאֶ֣הָ <WH4758> and in sight מִן־ <WH4480> than הָע֔וֹר <WH5785> than the skin וּשְׂעָרָ֖ה <WH8181> and the hair לֹא־ <WH3808> has not הָפַ֣ךְ <WH2015> thereof be not turned לָבָ֑ן <WH3836> white וְהִסְגִּ֧יר <WH5462> shall shut הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> then the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֶּ֖גַע <WH5061> up [him that hath] the plague שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וְרָאָ֣הוּ <WH7200> shall look הַכֹּהֵן֮ <WH3548> And the priest בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִי֒ <WH7637> on him the seventh וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and if הַנֶּ֙גַע֙ <WH5061> and behold [if] the plague עָמַ֣ד <WH5975> be at a stay בְּעֵינָ֔יו <WH5869> in his sight לֹֽא־ <WH3808> has not פָשָׂ֥ה <WH6581> spread הַנֶּ֖גַע <WH5061> [and] the plague בָּע֑וֹר <WH5785> not in the skin וְהִסְגִּיר֧וֹ <WH5462> shall shut הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> then the priest שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> him up seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days שֵׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> more

וְרָאָה֩ <WH7200> shall look הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <WH3548> And the priest אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִי֮ <WH7637> the seventh שֵׁנִית֒ <WH8145> on him again וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and if כֵּהָ֣ה <WH3544> [be] somewhat dark הַנֶּ֔גַע <WH5061> and behold [if] the plague וְלֹא־ <WH3808> has not פָשָׂ֥ה <WH6581> spread הַנֶּ֖גַע <WH5061> [and] the plague בָּע֑וֹר <WH5785> not in the skin וְטִהֲר֤וֹ <WH2891> shall pronounce him clean הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest מִסְפַּ֣חַת <WH4556> it [is but] a scab הִ֔יא <WH1931> and he וְכִבֶּ֥ס <WH3526> and he shall wash בְּגָדָ֖יו <WH899> his clothes וְטָהֵֽר׃ <WH2891> and be clean

וְאִם־ <WH518> if פָּשֹׂ֨ה <WH6581> spread much תִפְשֶׂ֤ה <WH6581> abroad הַמִּסְפַּ֙חַת֙ <WH4556> But if the scab בָּע֔וֹר <WH5785> in the skin אַחֲרֵ֧י <WH310> after הֵרָאֹת֛וֹ <WH7200> that he hath been seen אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> of the priest לְטָהֳרָת֑וֹ <WH2893> for his cleansing וְנִרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> he shall be seen שֵׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> again אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> of the priest

וְרָאָה֙ <WH7200> see הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> And [if] the priest וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and if פָּשְׂתָ֥ה <WH6581> spreadeth הַמִּסְפַּ֖חַת <WH4556> that behold the scab בָּע֑וֹר <WH5785> in the skin וְטִמְּא֥וֹ <WH2930> shall pronounce him unclean הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> then the priest צָרַ֥עַת <WH6883> it [is] a leprosy הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he פ

נֶ֣גַע <WH5061> When the plague צָרַ֔עַת <WH6883> of leprosy כִּ֥י <WH3588> When תִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> is on בְּאָדָ֑ם <WH120> is in a man וְהוּבָ֖א <WH935> then he shall be brought אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> unto the priest

וְרָאָ֣ה <WH7200> shall see הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> And the priest וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and if שְׂאֵת־ <WH7613> [him] and behold [if] the rising לְבָנָה֙ <WH3836> [be] white בָּע֔וֹר <WH5785> in the skin וְהִ֕יא <WH1931> and it הָפְכָ֖ה <WH2015> and it have turned שֵׂעָ֣ר <WH8181> the hair לָבָ֑ן <WH3836> white וּמִֽחְיַ֛ת <WH4241> and [there be] quick בָּשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> flesh חַ֖י <WH2416> raw בַּשְׂאֵֽת׃ <WH7613> in the rising

צָרַ֨עַת <WH6883> leprosy נוֹשֶׁ֤נֶת <WH3462> It [is] an old הִוא֙ <WH1931> he בְּע֣וֹר <WH5785> in the skin בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <WH1320> of his flesh וְטִמְּא֖וֹ <WH2930> shall pronounce him unclean הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> and the priest לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יַסְגִּרֶ֔נּוּ <WH5462> and shall not shut כִּ֥י <WH3588> for טָמֵ֖א <WH2931> him up for he [is] unclean הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאִם־ <WH518> If פָּר֨וֹחַ <WH6524> break out תִּפְרַ֤ח <WH6524> abroad הַצָּרַ֙עַת֙ <WH6883> And if a leprosy בָּע֔וֹר <WH5785> in the skin וְכִסְּתָ֣ה <WH3680> cover הַצָּרַ֗עַת <WH6883> and the leprosy אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all ע֣וֹר <WH5785> all the skin הַנֶּ֔גַע <WH5061> of [him that hath] the plague מֵרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> from his head וְעַד־ <WH5704> even רַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> even to his foot לְכָל־ <WH3605> far מַרְאֵ֖ה <WH4758> apparently עֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> affliction הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> wheresoever the priest

וְרָאָ֣ה <WH7200> shall consider הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> Then the priest וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> and behold כִסְּתָ֤ה <WH3680> have covered הַצָּרַ֙עַת֙ <WH6883> and behold [if] the leprosy אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּשָׂר֔וֹ <WH1320> all his flesh וְטִהַ֖ר <WH2891> he shall pronounce [him] clean אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּ֑גַע <WH5061> [that hath] the plague כֻּלּ֛וֹ <WH3605> has all הָפַ֥ךְ <WH2015> it is all turned לָבָ֖ן <WH3836> white טָה֥וֹר <WH2889> he [is] clean הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he
וּבְי֨וֹם <WH3117> But when הֵרָא֥וֹת <WH7200> appeareth בּ֛וֹ בָּשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> flesh חַ֖י <WH2416> raw יִטְמָֽא׃ <WH2930> in him he shall be unclean

וְרָאָ֧ה <WH7200> shall see הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> And the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> flesh הַחַ֖י <WH2416> the raw וְטִמְּא֑וֹ <WH2930> and pronounce him to be unclean הַבָּשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> flesh הַחַ֛י <WH2416> [for] the raw טָמֵ֥א <WH2931> [is] unclean ה֖וּא <WH1931> it צָרַ֥עַת <WH6883> it [is] a leprosy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

א֣וֹ <WH176> Or כִ֥י <WH3588> if יָשׁ֛וּב <WH7725> turn again הַבָּשָׂ֥ר <WH1320> flesh הַחַ֖י <WH2416> Or if the raw וְנֶהְפַּ֣ךְ <WH2015> and be changed לְלָבָ֑ן <WH3836> unto white וּבָ֖א <WH935> he shall come אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> unto the priest

וְרָאָ֙הוּ֙ <WH7200> shall see הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> And the priest וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> and behold נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <WH2015> be turned הַנֶּ֖גַע <WH5061> him and behold [if] the plague לְלָבָ֑ן <WH3836> into white וְטִהַ֧ר <WH2891> shall pronounce [him] clean הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> then the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֶּ֖גַע <WH5061> [that hath] the plague טָה֥וֹר <WH2889> he [is] clean הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he פ
וּבָשָׂ֕ר <WH1320> The flesh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> also in which יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> has בֽוֹ־ בְעֹר֖וֹ <WH5785> [even] in the skin שְׁחִ֑ין <WH7822> thereof was a boil וְנִרְפָּֽא׃ <WH7495> and is healed

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> become בִּמְק֤וֹם <WH4725> And in the place הַשְּׁחִין֙ <WH7822> of the boil שְׂאֵ֣ת <WH7613> rising לְבָנָ֔ה <WH3836> there be a white א֥וֹ <WH176> or בַהֶ֖רֶת <WH934> or a bright spot לְבָנָ֣ה <WH3836> white אֲדַמְדָּ֑מֶת <WH125> and somewhat reddish וְנִרְאָ֖ה <WH7200> and it be shewed אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> to the priest

וְרָאָ֣ה <WH7200> seeth הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> And if when the priest וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold מַרְאֶ֙הָ֙ <WH4758> it behold it [be] in sight שָׁפָ֣ל <WH8217> lower מִן־ <WH4480> than הָע֔וֹר <WH5785> than the skin וּשְׂעָרָ֖הּ <WH8181> and the hair הָפַ֣ךְ <WH2015> thereof be turned לָבָ֑ן <WH3836> white וְטִמְּא֧וֹ <WH2930> shall pronounce him unclean הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> the priest נֶֽגַע־ <WH5061> it [is] a plague צָרַ֥עַת <WH6883> of leprosy הִ֖וא <WH1931> he בַּשְּׁחִ֥ין <WH7822> out of the boil פָּרָֽחָה׃ <WH6524> broken

וְאִ֣ם ׀ <WH518> if יִרְאֶ֣נָּה <WH7200> look הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> But if the priest וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold אֵֽין־ <WH369> there בָּהּ֙ שֵׂעָ֣ר <WH8181> hairs לָבָ֔ן <WH3836> on it and behold [there be] no white וּשְׁפָלָ֥ה <WH8217> therein and [if] it [be] not lower אֵינֶ֛נָּה <WH369> are no מִן־ <WH4480> than הָע֖וֹר <WH5785> than the skin וְהִ֣יא <WH1931> and is כֵהָ֑ה <WH3544> but [be] somewhat dark וְהִסְגִּיר֥וֹ <WH5462> shall shut הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> then the priest שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> him up seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days

וְאִם־ <WH518> and if פָּשֹׂ֥ה <WH6581> And if it spread much תִפְשֶׂ֖ה <WH6581> abroad בָּע֑וֹר <WH5785> in the skin וְטִמֵּ֧א <WH2930> shall pronounce him unclean הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> then the priest אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> נֶ֥גַע <WH5061> it [is] a plague הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he

וְאִם־ <WH518> if תַּחְתֶּ֜יהָ <WH8478> place תַּעֲמֹ֤ד <WH5975> stay הַבַּהֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH934> But if the bright spot לֹ֣א <WH3808> and does not פָשָׂ֔תָה <WH6581> in his place [and] spread צָרֶ֥בֶת <WH6867> not it [is] a burning הַשְּׁחִ֖ין <WH7822> boil הִ֑וא <WH1931> he וְטִהֲר֖וֹ <WH2891> shall pronounce him clean הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> and the priest ס

א֣וֹ <WH176> Or בָשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> Or if there be [any] flesh כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> sustains בְעֹר֖וֹ <WH5785> in the skin מִכְוַת־ <WH4348> burning אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> whereof [there is] a hot וְֽהָיְתָ֞ה <WH1961> becomes מִֽחְיַ֣ת <WH4241> and the quick הַמִּכְוָ֗ה <WH4348> [flesh] that burneth בַּהֶ֛רֶת <WH934> bright spot לְבָנָ֥ה <WH3836> have a white אֲדַמְדֶּ֖מֶת <WH125> somewhat reddish א֥וֹ <WH176> or לְבָנָֽה׃ <WH3836> or white

וְרָאָ֣ה <WH7200> shall look אֹתָ֣הּ <WH854> for הַכֹּהֵ֡ן <WH3548> Then the priest וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and if נֶהְפַּךְ֩ <WH2015> be turned שֵׂעָ֨ר <WH8181> upon it and behold [if] the hair לָבָ֜ן <WH3836> white בַּבַּהֶ֗רֶת <WH934> in the bright spot וּמַרְאֶ֙הָ֙ <WH4758> and it [be in] sight עָמֹ֣ק <WH6013> deeper מִן־ <WH4480> than הָע֔וֹר <WH5785> than the skin צָרַ֣עַת <WH6883> it [is] a leprosy הִ֔וא <WH1931> he בַּמִּכְוָ֖ה <WH4348> out of the burning פָּרָ֑חָה <WH6524> broken וְטִמֵּ֤א <WH2930> shall pronounce him unclean אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> wherefore the priest נֶ֥גַע <WH5061> it [is] the plague צָרַ֖עַת <WH6883> of leprosy הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> he
